Package pkgMain

Class SummaryScreen

java.lang.Object
pkgMain.SummaryScreen
public class SummaryScreen
extends java.lang.Object
SummaryScreen class. Formats the Summary Screen. Displays a summary of information for the garden.
Author:
Aidan Chao, Nicholas Cutrona, Caleb Davis, Joey Loporto, Tommy Cheung

      public void createTileData​(java.lang.String gardenName, int remainingBudget, int finalLeps)

      remainingBudget - int budget remaining after plants are purchased
      finalLeps - int final total lep count for the garden

    • createSummaryScreen

      public javafx.scene.layout.BorderPane createSummaryScreen​(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​Plant> plantData, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​javafx.scene.image.Image> imageData, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> dataFrequency, java.lang.String gardenName, int remainingBudget, int finalLeps)

      BorderPane for SummaryScreen
